Key.Original: Please tell me if any translations are wrong and i will correct it
Key.English: Please tell me if any translations are wrong and i will correct it
Key.Czech: Prosím, řekněte mi, jestli je v překladu něco špatne a já to opravím
Key.French: S'il vous plaît me dire si toutes les traductions sont fausses et je vais corriger
Key.German: Bitte teile es mir mit, wenn irgendwelche Übersetzungen falsch sein sollten, ich werde diese dann korrigieren
Key.Italian: La prego di dirmi se eventuali traduzioni sono sbagliate e io correggerlo
Key.Polish: Proszę mi powiedzieć, czy wszystkie tłumaczenia są błędne i będę go poprawić
Key.Portuguese: Por favor, digam-me se alguma tradução está errada para eu corrigir
Key.Russian: Пожалуйста, скажите мне, если какие-либо переводы неверны и я исправлю их
Key.Spanish: Por favor dígame si algunas traducciones están mal las corregiré

Key.Original: Click to Switch between HALO or Ground Spawn
Key.English: Click to Switch between HALO or Ground Spawn

Key.Original: Click to Switch between Gear and Spawn Selection
Key.English: Click to Switch between Gear and Spawn Selection

Key.Original: You do not need to pick every piece of gear, just select a few and press Select spawn ... you will get random of remaining items
Key.English: You do not need to pick every piece of gear, just select a few and press Select spawn ... you will get random of remaining items

Key.Original: Can't spawn here, you have a body nearby the position ...
Key.English: Can't spawn here, you have a body nearby the position ...
Key.Czech: Nelze se Spawnut, máte tělo poblíž pozici ...
Key.French: Vous ne pouvez pas reproduire ici, vous avez un corps à proximité de la position ...
Key.German: Du kannst hier nicht spawnen, dein Körper liegt in der Nähe ...
Key.Italian: Non può generare qui, avete un corpo vicino alla posizione di ...
Key.Polish: Nie może pojawiać się tutaj, masz ciało w pobliżu pozycji ...
Key.Portuguese: Não podes spawnar aqui, tens um corpo por perto ...
Key.Spanish: No puedes aparecer aquí, tienes un cuerpo cerca de la posición ...

Key.Original: Scroll and press mouse wheel to open chute ...
Key.English: Scroll and press mouse wheel to open chute ...
Key.Czech: Protočte a stiskněte kolečko myši pro otevření padáku ...
Key.French: Faites défiler et appuyez sur la roue de la souris pour ouvrir goulotte ...
Key.German: Mausrad nach unten um den fallschirm zu öffnen
Key.Italian: Scorrere e rotella del mouse premere per aprire lo scivolo ...
Key.Polish: Przewiń i koło naciśnij myszy, aby otworzyć spadochron ...
Key.Portuguese: Scroll e roda de imprensa do mouse para abrir calha ...
Key.Russian: Покрутите колесо мыши и выберите Раскрыть парашут ...
Key.Spanish: Scroll y boton central del ratón para abrir paracaídas ...

Key.Original: HALO Spawned near %1\nBuckle up %2\ncuz yr goin for a ride...
Key.English: HALO Spawned near %1\nBuckle up %2\ncuz yr goin for a ride...
Key.German: Falschirm spawned bei der Ausrüstung %1\nViel Glück %2
Key.Spanish: Aparición en HALO cerca de %1\nBuena Suerte %2

Key.Original: Spawned near %1\nBuckle up %2\ncuz yr goin for a ride...
Key.English: Spawned near %1\nBuckle up %2\ncuz yr goin for a ride...

Key.German: Doppel klick um auf die festgelegten Position zu spawnen
Key.Italian: Fare doppio clic per Spawn registrato
Key.Portuguese: Double Click do Spawn Para Registered
Key.Spanish: Double click para aparicion de registrados

Key.French: Double Cliquez Pour Spawn des donateurs
Key.German: Doppel klick um auf Donator zu spawnen
Key.Portuguese: Double Click Para Doador do Spawn
Key.Spanish: Double click para aparición de donante

Key.Original: Double Click, to Spawn Near Jammer
Key.English: Double Click, to Spawn Near Jammer
Key.Czech: Dvoj klik, aby se zrodily poblíž Jammeru
Key.French: Double Click, à Spawn Près Jammer
Key.German: Doppel klick um auf dem jammer zu spawnen
Key.Italian: Double Click, per deporre le uova vicino Jammer
Key.Polish: Kliknij dwukrotnie, aby pojawić się w pobliżu Jammera
Key.Portuguese: Double Click, para desovar Perto Jammer
Key.Russian: Двойной щелчок, чтобы выбрать спавн возле Jammer
Key.Spanish: Doble click, para aparecer junto al Jammer

Key.Original: Double Click, to Spawn Near Group Leader.
Key.English: Double Click, to Spawn Near Group Leader.
Key.Czech: Dvoj klik, aby se zrodili poblíž Velitele Skupiny.
Key.French: Double Click, à Spawn Près de chef de groupe.
Key.German: Doppel kilck um auf Gruppenanführer zu spawnen
Key.Italian: Double Click, a deporre le uova vicino Capo Gruppo.
Key.Polish: Kliknij dwukrotnie, aby pojawić się w pobliżu Przywódcy.
Key.Portuguese: Double Click, para desovar Perto Líder do Grupo.
Key.Russian: Двойной щелчок, чтобы выбрать спавн возле лидера группы.
Key.Spanish: Doble click para aparecer cerca del lider de grupo.

Key.German: Doppel klick um zufällig zu spawnen
Key.Italian: Fare doppio clic per Spawn a caso.
Key.Portuguese: Double Click do Spawn Para Aleatório.
Key.Spanish: Double click para aparecer en un sitio aleatorio.

Key.Original: You need to be a donor to spawn here ...
Key.English: You need to be a donor to spawn here ...
Key.Czech: Musíte být Dárce, aby se zrodili zde ...
Key.French: Vous devez être un donneur pour frayer ici ...
Key.German: Du musst ein Donator sein um hier zu spawnen
Key.Italian: Devi essere un donatore per deporre le uova qui ...
Key.Polish: Musisz być donatorem aby pojawić się tutaj ...
Key.Portuguese: Você precisa ser um doador para desovar aqui ...
Key.Russian: Вы должны быть донором, чтобы выбрать спавн тут ...
Key.Spanish: ¡Tienes que ser un donante para aparecer aquí ...

Key.Original: You need to be a registered user to spawn here ...
Key.English: You need to be a registered user to spawn here ...
Key.Czech: Musíte být registrovaným uživatelem, aby se zrodili zde ...
Key.French: Vous devez être un utilisateur enregistré pour frayer ici ...
Key.German: Du musst registriert sein um hier zu spawnen
Key.Italian: Devi essere un utente registrato per deporre le uova qui ...
Key.Polish: Musisz być zarejestrowanym użytkownikiem, aby pojawiać się tutaj ...
Key.Portuguese: Você precisa ser um usuário registrado para desovar aqui ...
Key.Russian: Вы должны быть зарегистрированным пользователем, чтобы выбрать спавн тут ...
Key.Spanish: ¡Tienes que ser un usuario registrado para aparecer aquí ...

Key.Original: Click to Switch Between Buy / Sell Mode
Key.English: Click to Switch Between Buy / Sell Mode
Key.French: Cliquez pour basculer entre le mode Achat / Vente
Key.German: Klick um zwischen Kaufen / Verkaufen zu wechseln
Key.Spanish: Haga clic para cambiar entre Comprar / Modo de Venta

Key.German: Klicke um den kauf zu bestätigen
Key.Spanish: Haga clic para confirmar la compra

Key.Original: Select 1/2 Price Rent-a-car or Buy Full Price Vehicle:
Key.English: Select 1/2 Price Rent-a-car or Buy Full Price Vehicle:
Key.French: Sélectionnez Moitié prix temporaire ou Full Prix Véhicule:
Key.German: 1/2 Preis,Fahrzeug speichert nicht oder voller Preis,Fahrzeug speichert:
Key.Spanish: Seleccione mitad de precio temporal o completa Precio Vehículo Guardados:

Key.French: Acheter un véhicule qui est stocké
Key.Spanish: Comprar un vehículo que se almacena

Key.Original: Press to Rent 1/2 Price Vehicle Until next restart
Key.English: Press to Rent 1/2 Price Vehicle Until next restart
Key.German: Drücke um ein 1/2 Fahrzeug zu Mieten(nur bis zum restart)

Key.Original: Press to Check if you can buy a saved vehicle
Key.English: Press to Check if you can buy a saved vehicle
Key.French: Appuyez sur pour vérifier la limite du monde du véhicule
Key.Spanish: Pulse para comprobar límite mundial de vehículos

Key.Original: Double click an item to add it to the buy / sell list, switch between buy and sell mode by pressing the Buy / Sell Mode button
Key.English: Double click an item to add it to the buy / sell list, switch between buy and sell mode by pressing the Buy / Sell Mode button
Key.French: Double-cliquez sur un objet pour l'ajouter dans la liste, changer entre l'achat / vente en appuyant sur le bouton d'achat
Key.German: Doppelklick auf einen Gegenstand um diesen in der Liste zuzufügen, wechsel zwischen Kauf/Verkauf indem du den Kauf Knopf drückst
Key.Russian: Дважды кликните по предмету для добавления его в список покупки/продажи. Переключиться между покупкой и продажой можно нажатием кнопки Покупка/Продажа
Key.Spanish: Haga doble clic en un objeto para agregarlo en la lista, cambiar entre la compra / venta al presionar el botón de compra

Key.Original: Your Uniform was not empty ... not sold
Key.English: Your Uniform was not empty ... not sold
Key.French: Votre Uniform était pas vide ... pas vendu
Key.German: Deine Uniform ist nicht leer ... wurde nicht verkauft
Key.Russian: Твоя одежда не пуста... нельзя продать
Key.Spanish: Su Uniform no estaba vacía ... no se vende

Key.Original: Your Vest was not empty ... not sold
Key.English: Your Vest was not empty ... not sold
Key.French: Votre Vest était pas vide ... pas vendu
Key.German: Deine Weste ist nicht leer ... wurde nicht verkauft
Key.Russian: Твоя разгрузка не пуста... нельзя продать
Key.Spanish: Su chaleco no estaba vacía ... no se vende

Key.Original: Your Backpack was not empty ... not sold
Key.English: Your Backpack was not empty ... not sold
Key.French: Votre sac à dos était pas vide ... pas vendu
Key.German: Dein Rucksack ist nicht leer ... wurde nicht verkauft
Key.Russian: Твой рюкзак не пустой... нельзя продать
Key.Spanish: Su mochila no estaba vacía ... no se vende
Error al vender 1% ... no está vacío!

Key.Original: You already have a Weapon in the hand ...
Key.English: You already have a Weapon in the hand ...
Key.French: Vous avez déjà une arme dans la main ...
Key.German: Sie haben bereits eine Waffe in der Hand ...
Key.Russian: У тебя уже есть оружие в руке!
Key.Spanish: Ya tiene un arma en la mano ...

Key.Original: You are already wearing a Backpack
Key.English: You are already wearing a Backpack
Key.French: Vous êtes déjà vêtu d'une Backpack
Vous êtes déjà vêtu d'une Glasses
Vous êtes déjà vêtu d'une Headgear

Key.Original: You are already Wearing a Uniform
Key.English: You are already Wearing a Uniform
Key.French: Vous êtes déjà vêtu d'une uniform

Key.Original: You are already Wearing a vest
Key.English: You are already Wearing a vest
Key.French: Vous êtes déjà vêtu d'une veste

Key.Original: What you could not have in your inventory is on the ground near you ...
Key.English: What you could not have in your inventory is on the ground near you ...
Key.French: Qu'est-ce que vous ne pourriez pas avoir dans votre inventaire est sur le terrain près de chez vous
Key.German: Item passt nicht ins Iventar, es liegt jetzt auf dem Boden in der nähe
Key.Russian: То что не влезло в инвентарь - валяется где то рядом...
Key.Spanish: Lo que no se podía tener en su inventario está en el suelo cerca de usted

Key.Original: You do not have enough Crypto to buy this ...
Key.English: You do not have enough Crypto to buy this ...
Key.French: Vous ne disposez pas de suffisamment Crypto

Key.Original: Not allowed to spam this button, wait another %1 seconds
Key.English: Not allowed to spam this button, wait another %1 seconds
Key.French: Non autorisé à spammer ce bouton, attendre une autre %1 secondes
Key.German: Es ist nicht erlaubt den Knopf so oft zu drücken, warte %1 sekunden
Key.Russian: Хватить херачить по кнопке, а если я в тебя так потыкаю ?! Подожди хотя бы %1 секунд...
Key.Spanish: No se permite el spam en este botón, esperar otro %1 segundo
